channel.title: Paragon - A model of perfection
channel.description:
Just a little bit about me: I'm 20 years old, in my first year of Computer Science and decided that I'd start a RSPS while I study for the Oracle Certified Associate Java Programmer certification. This is a learning experience for me and this is my first attempt at a RSPS. That said, if you have any suggestions on improving the server (not website), please post them on the website or in a reply.
Website: [url=http://www.pararsps.com]Paragon | A model of perfection[/url] Download: [url=http://www.pararsps.com/download/]Play[/url]
I know the forums are horrid, they are a temporary solution until I can find a more permanent forum like myBB or vBulletin. I honestly have no idea what I'm doing when it comes to building a website.
[B][U][SIZE=6]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=5][B]-Economy based on skilling[/B][/SIZE] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4584887/fishing.PNG[/img] [SIZE=5][B]-Instant PKing (Fight for your soul) - PK For fun or turn on "RiskPK" to risk coins.[/B][/SIZE] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4584888/Range2h.PNG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4585019/Dragon_Claws.PNG[/img] (Ignore the developer's note in the chatbox. :P) [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4584891/dh.PNG[/img] [SIZE=5][B]-Dicing & Mithril Seeds with correct RS percentages[/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=5][B]-Trivia Bot [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4584897/Triviabot.PNG[/img] -Killing Spree Announcements -200M experience mastery capes & server announcement -Clan chat [/B] [/SIZE]
Stuff I plan on adding: Quests that alter your QuickPK gear slightly if completed. PvM (Bossing) 21 skills all working at at least 90%
I hope to see some of you guys online! I am eager to implement your ideas and respond to your feedback, keep in mind this is my first attempt at this and I've done it all alone because I have no friends. :c

item.title: Paragon - A model of perfection
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I’d say more media is needed. The website needs alot of work (you acknowledge it). I’d like to see where this goes, Goodluck.

Read full topic

item.title: Paragon - A model of perfection
item.dc:creator: @Paraborn Paraborn
item.description:
@Paraborn wrote:

Just a little bit about me: I’m 20 years old, in my first year of Computer Science and decided that I’d start a RSPS while I study for the Oracle Certified Associate Java Programmer certification.
This is a learning experience for me and this is my first attempt at a RSPS. That said, if you have any suggestions on improving the server (not website), please post them on the website or in a reply.

Website: Paragon | A model of perfection
Download: Play

I know the forums are horrid, they are a temporary solution until I can find a more permanent forum like myBB or vBulletin. I honestly have no idea what I’m doing when it comes to building a website.

[B][U][SIZE=6]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SIZE=5][B]-Economy based on skilling[/B][/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][B]-Instant PKing (Fight for your soul) - PK For fun or turn on “RiskPK” to risk coins.[/B][/SIZE]


(Ignore the developer’s note in the chatbox. :P)

[SIZE=5][B]-Dicing & Mithril Seeds with correct RS percentages[/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][B]-Trivia Bot

-Killing Spree Announcements
-200M experience mastery capes & server announcement
-Clan chat
[/B]
[/SIZE]

Stuff I plan on adding:
Quests that alter your QuickPK gear slightly if completed.
PvM (Bossing)
21 skills all working at at least 90%

I hope to see some of you guys online!
I am eager to implement your ideas and respond to your feedback, keep in mind this is my first attempt at this and I’ve done it all alone because I have no friends. :c
